Ono kad je i 45.000.000 evra malo
Kada je Zinedin Zidan letos pravio nacrte za novu sezonu i dodeljivao uloge, Rodriga nije video u najozbiljnijim planovima i ispred njega bili su Vinisijus, Lukas Vaskez, Luka Jović, pa čak i Isko, Hames Rodrigez i Geret Bejl! Na kraju je Rodrigo sve pretekao, uzeo loptu, odneo je kući i s mirom sklopio oči. Uradio je posao koji mu nije bio ni dodeljen i odradio ga je izvanredno

07 Nov 2019


Nadimak mu je Munja, odnosno Raio na portugalskom. Učitelj mu je bio neponovljivi Pele, a san od malih nogu da obuče dres najvećeg kluba na svetu i postane ime koje će ljudi pamtiti. Mada još nije oduvao ni 19 rođendanskih svećica na torti, Rodrigo Goes je u skladu s nadimkom zapalio Madrid i kao dečko koji je tek uplovio u svet odraslih doživeo da mu ceo Santjago Bernabeu kliče!

Bilo je to veče koje će zauvek imati Rodrigov pečat. Vatromet golova u ubedljivoj pobedi nad Galatasarajem doveo je golobradog Brazilca do zvezda. Postigao je savršeni het-trik. Prvo levom, pa glavom i onda vrhovim prstiju desne noge u nadoknadi vremena za ispunjenje dečačkih snova. Rodrigo je u demonstraciji savršene fudbalske predstave izrastao u drugog najmlađeg strelca het-trika u istoriji Lige šampiona. Sa 18 godina i 301 danom momak rodom iz Ozaska, gradića u državi Sao Paulo, stao je iza legendarnog kapitena Reala Raula Gonzaleza Blanka koji je sa 18 godina i 113 dana protiv Ferencvaroša upisao svoj prvi triling u oktobru 1995.
Sinoć je Rodrigo dokazao zašto već sada tako minorno deluje investicija od 45.000.000 evra, koliko je Real platio Santosu za novu zvezdu u usponu. U treptaju oka iskoristio je centaršut Marsela za 1:0. Gosti nisu stigli ni da se oporave od početnog šoka, a ista kombinacija donela je Realu vođstvo od 2:0. Da će ovo biti veče dečka koji je sinoć ispunio snove klinaca širom sveta videlo se pred sam odlazak na odmor. U savršenom trenutku spazio je Karima Benzemu, koga je jednim potezom uposlio, a majstoru kakav je francuski golgeter nije bilo teško da samo “lizne” loptu u gol.



Rodrigo je sinoć radio ono što je njegov mentor Pele i predvideo. Gazio je najvećom scenom, pred najstrašnijim auditorijumom, podigao narod na noge i u utakmici Lige šampiona pokazao da više nije dete. U svojoj šestoj utakmici u opremi Blankosa odneo je loptu kući – tradicija kada igrač postigne het-trik – što je svojevremeno za rukom pošlo čuvenom Alfredu di Stefanu. Toliko je utakmica bilo potrebno Rodrigu da stigne do brojke od pet golova, dok su dve legendarne “sedmice” Raul Gonzalez i Butragenjo za isto vreme tresli mrežu tek po dva puta. Poređenja radi, Raulu je bilo potrebno deset, a Butragenju jedanaest utakmica kako bi stigli do pet recki kraj svog imena. Ultratalentovanom Brazilcu samo 360 minuta. Ipak, teren će morati da se natopi litrima i litrima znoja pre nego što Rodrigo uopšte dostigne njihove visine. Početak u najvećem klubu na svetu nije mogao da bude lepši...
Prošle večeri Rodrigo je postao i najmlađi brazilski strelac u dresu Kraljevskog kluba. Rekord je donedavno držao Markinjos koji je gol video s nešto malo više od 19 godina. Opet, najmlađi je fudbaler sa savršenim het-trikom u džepu, čime je pretekao najveću želju Florentina Pereza - Kilijana Mbapea. Njegov blickrig s početka utakmice drugi je najbrži u istoriji Blankosa za igrača ispod 20 godina, ujedno i najbrži u Ligi šampiona.



Kada je Zinedin Zidan letos pravio nacrte za novu sezonu i dodeljivao uloge, Rodriga nije video u najozbiljnijim planovima i ispred njega bili su Vinisijus, Lukas Vaskez, Luka Jović, pa čak i Isko, Hames Rodrigez i Geret Bejl! Na kraju je Rodrigo sve pretekao, uzeo loptu, odneo je kući i s mirom sklopio oči. Uradio je posao koji mu nije bio ni dodeljen i odradio ga je izvanredno. Plesao je sambu na kraljevskoj travi i odigrao individualno najbolju partiju dosadašnje sezone u strahovitoj konkurenciji! Svedoci dešavanja u madridskom klubu kažu da Rodrigo odiše neverovatnom ozbiljnošću za momka od 18 godina, da je jako skroman, iskren i razigran na svakom treningu. A, kada dostigne punu brzinu, iza sebe ostavlja sve i svakog. Tokom vremenskog intervala od četiri meseca Rodrigo je, kažu, radio svakog dana, po nekoliko puta dnevno kako bi se što pre adaptirao na klimu najveće fudbalske sredine.
Sada ga čeka dres Selesaoa, o kojem maštaju milioni klinaca na ulicama Brazila. Taj san je Rodrigo nosio sa sobom u krevet donedavno, a uskoro će moći da ih se seća dok lista stranice foto-albuma...
Foto: Reuters

07 Nov 2019


He is nicknamed Lightning, or Raio in Portuguese. His teacher was the inimitable Pele, a dream from a young age to wear the jersey of the biggest club in the world and become a name that people will remember. Although he hadn't even blown 19 birthday candles on his cake, Rodrigo Goes nicknamed Madrid in the nick of time, and as a boy who had just made it into the adult world, experienced the whole of Santiago Bernabeu's calling!

It was an evening that will forever have Rodrigo's seal. The fireworks of goals in a convincing victory over Galatasaray brought the Brazilian golfer to the stars. He scored the perfect hat trick. First with the left, then with my head and then with the tips of the toes of my right foot to make up for the time to fulfill my boyhood dreams. In a demonstration of perfect football, Rodrigo has grown into the second youngest hat-trick scorer in Champions League history. At 18 years old and 301 days old, a native of Sao Paulo, a small town in the state of Sao Paulo, is behind legendary Real Captain Raul Gonzalez Blanco, who at 18 years and 113 days enrolled in his first trilling in October 1995.
Last night, Rodrigo proved why the € 45,000,000 investment that Realos paid Santos for a new rising star is so minor now. In the blink of an eye, he used the centerpiece of Marseille for 1-0. The visitors did not even manage to recover from the initial shock, and the same combination gave Real a 2-0 lead. That this would be the evening of the boyfriend who fulfilled the dreams of kids around the world last night was seen just before going on vacation. At the perfect moment, he saw Karim Benzema, whom he employed in one move, and it was not difficult for a master like the French goalkeeper to just lick the ball into the goal.



Rodrigo did what his mentor Pele had predicted last night. Gazio made the biggest scene, in front of the scariest auditorium, lifted the nation to its feet and showed in the Champions League game that he was no longer a child. In his sixth game at the Blankos outfit, he took the ball home - a tradition when a player scores a hat trick - which in turn went to the famous Alfred di Stefano. It took so many games for Rodrigo to reach the five-goal mark, while two legendary "weeks" of Raul Gonzalez and Butragenjo shook the net only twice at the same time. By comparison, it took Raoul ten and Butrageni eleven games to reach the five rivers near his name. To an ultrathalt Brazilian just 360 minutes. Still, the terrain will need to be soaked in liters and liters of sweat before Rodrigo reaches their heights at all. Starting at the biggest club in the world couldn't have been nicer ...
Last night, Rodrigo became the youngest Brazilian scorer in the Royal Club jersey. Until recently, the record was held by Markinjos, who saw the nude video at just over 19 years old. Again, he is the youngest football player with the perfect hat trick in his pocket, overtaking Florentine Perez's biggest wish - Killian Mbape. His blickrig since the start of the game is the second fastest in Blankos history for a player under 20, also the fastest in the Champions League.



When Zinedine Zidan drafted the new season and assigned roles this summer, he did not see Rodrigo in his most serious plans, and ahead of him were Vincius, Lukas Vasquez, Luka Jovic, and even Isko, Hames Rodrigez and Geret Bale! In the end, Rodrigo threatened everyone, took the ball, took it home and closed his eyes with peace. He did a job that wasn't even assigned to him and he did extraordinary work. He danced samba on royal grass and played the individually best party of the season so far in a fierce competition! Witnesses to the events at the Madrid club say Rodrigo exudes incredible seriousness for a boy of 18, that he is very humble, honest and playful at every training session. And when it reaches full speed, it leaves everyone behind. For four months, Rodrigo said, he worked every day several times a day to adapt to the climate of the biggest football environment as soon as possible.
He is now waiting for a Selesao jersey, imagined by millions of kids on the streets of Brazil. That dream Rodrigo has carried with him to bed until recently, and he will soon be able to remember them as he lists the photo album page ...
